original_title: ど田舎に単身赴任中の僕に優しい大家の奥さんと汗だく性交。 三宮つばき
overview: Yudzuru gets assigned to work in the deep countryside, and he has to go work alone leaving alone his wife, who is against the move.  The place is not promising at all, but Yudzuru finds comfort in the young and frustrated wife of the landlord.
title: I Was Posted To The Boondocks And That’s Where I Met My Landlord’s Wife Who Kindly And Gently Gave Me Sweaty Sex Tsubaki Sannomiya
